version_description:
Here, in Abyss,
Thrilling and deep,
You’ll find chat-stories
That won’t let you sleep!

Here, in Abyss,
Thrilling and deep,
You’ll find chat-stories
That won’t let you sleep!

Wanna find a certain story?
Story search is what you need!
Which is more – now you can go to
Any episode to read :)

Thrilling and deep,

Here, in Abyss,
Thrilling and deep,

That won’t let you sleep!

- Knock knock.
- Who are you?
- I’m a ghost, a scary ghost.
Now you can see the preview
Of the stories that we post.

- Knock knock.
- What do you want?
- Will you let me in, oh, please?
I just want to say - a haunt
On the best story begins.

- Knock knock.
- What’s your name?
- I’m a monster, a big monster.
Choose a story right away
Just having look at cover’s poster.

- Knock knock.
- Who are you?
- I’m a ghost, a scary ghost.
Now you can see the preview
Of the stories that we post.

- Knock knock.
- What do you want?
- Will you let me in, oh, please?
I just want to say - a haunt
On the best story begins.

- Knock knock.
- What’s your name?
- I’m a monster, a big monster.
Choose a story right away
Just having look at cover’s poster.

I am coming for you, little one...
Do you feel shivers down the spine?
Don't be scared, I just want you to show
The darkest part of your soul and your mind.

- How to find my favorite​ story?
Don't like playing riddle-game!
- You can do it very quickly
Searching it by title's name!

Love couple, a beautiful evening sunset,
The two are so happy together.
But scary dark figure is really dead set
He wants to break up them for ever.

Don’t worry, this story is happy end –
He used to kill people in different manners.
We set a new icon to show you, dear friend,
That “Abyss” has various genres.

He wants to break up them for ever.

Don’t worry, this story is happy end –

We set a new icon to show you, dear friend,
That “Abyss” has various genres.

Wasting time on boring class?
Come on, dive into Abyss.
Here are tons of thrilling stories.
Read them all now, take your chance!

Finished all? Then we are sorry!
It’s no reason yet to worry.
You can try yourself in writing
And make up your own story.

Wasting time on boring class?
Come on, dive into Abyss.
Here are tons of thrilling stories.
Read them all now, take your chance!

Finished all? Then we are sorry!
It’s no reason yet to worry.
You can try yourself in writing
And make up your own story.

Four, three, two, one.
Monster’s near. Quickly, run!
Read Abyss, don’t waste a minute!
Now it works a bit more quickly.

Andy: Hi, wanna go to the movies tonight?
Mary: Nooo, I've got stuck in reading this Abyss app I told you about
Mary: Some new stories appeared! Very interesting!

Monsters stalking through the night,
Zombies ready for the fight,
Witches, demons, ghosts and… Bing!
That’s what can Abyss stories bring.

By the way, some bugs are fixed.
Read new story, it's released.

Anna: You won’t believe what just happened!!!
Max: Wtf? Was gonna sleep
Anna: Abyss updated!
Max: And?..
Anna: And there are AUDIO STORIES now!!!
Max: WOW! That’s cool! Sleep is for wimps :D

Max: Do you still read these stories in Abyss?
Anna: I like listening to them much more! Have you tried that?))
Max: Yeah… But you still have to keep the screen turned on while you listen, that’s not cool :(
Anna: Now you don’t! The new update lets you turn off the screen and listen to a story on the run. That’s absolutely great!!!
Max: Wow! Should give it a try then!

- Hey, are you sleeping?
- No, sup?
- Here's a creepy man outside my window.
- With a "delivery" on his sack?
- Yeah... you know him?
- I've ordered you some app improvements, just install!

- Hey, are you sleeping?
- No, sup?
- Here's a creepy man outside my window.
- With a "delivery" on his sack?
- Yeah... you know him?
- I've ordered you some app improvements, just install!

- Something has just flown right into my window! It's been so fast as if it had a propeller!
- What is it?
- Looks like a package. Any ideas what's inside?
- Ah, it's app improvements. The app is gonna work as fast as lightning with them.

- Something has just flown right into my window! It's been so fast as if it had a propeller!
- What is it?
- Looks like a package. Any ideas what's inside?
- Ah, it's app improvements. The app is gonna work as fast as lightning with them.

- I can't sleep again.
- What now?
- The delivery man is here again. I think he wants to kill me...
- Why?
- He's whispering something and holding out a black package through the window.
- Ah, its the app improvements again!
- How do you know?
- I've already received them and it has only got better!

- I can't sleep again.
- What now?
- The delivery man is here again. I think he wants to kill me...
- Why?
- He's whispering something and holding out a black package through the window.
- Ah, its the app improvements again!
- How do you know?
- I've already received them and it has only got better!

- Hey, how are you today?
- Not so good...
- Why?
- I've been working like a dog since morning.
- Then you'll be happy to get some new app appearance improvements: they are gonna raise your spirits!
